briefdescription.para: Indicates that the model has not any error.
Indicates that the model has not setted a image.
Indicates that the image setted in the model doesn't exist.
Indicates that the model has not any image associated.
The ModelError enum.

detaileddescription.para: Contains all errors that can has the model.

briefdescription.para: Indicates that there aren't any error during the process.
Indicates that a null pointer has been received.
Indicates that the string to process already exists in the model.
Indicates that file to import can't ber readed.
Indicates that the file to import has not a correct format.
Indicates that the file to read doesn't exist.
Indicates that there is no host to send the file.
Indicates that the IP to use is not valid.
Indicates that an error ocurred in sshpass process.
Indicates that an error ocurred in ssh process.
Indicates that the last try to write in disk wrong.
The CodeError enum.

detaileddescription.para: Contains all general error that can happen during any process of the controller.
WARNING!! Don't change the default values of enum. Binary program returns this number values.

briefdescription.para: The match will be done taking strings with the same idetifier.
The match will be done taking strings with the same value.
The match will be done taking strings with similar value to the one you are looking for.
The MatchType enum.

detaileddescription.para: Contains all match types by which you can search a string.

briefdescription.para: Width of each chunk when a image is splitted.
Height of each chunk when a image is splitted.
Directory where will save project images.
Directory where will save projects.
Directory where will save configurations.
File path where the firmware strings will be found.
Pointer to the contextualization model.
Original file where be all firmware strings.
Username who run the app.
Valid states of firmware strings.
Host where the contextualization will be sent.
If is true, only string with state DONE will be found.
Indicates if searches will be case sensitive or not.
Constructs a controller setting his member variables.

detaileddescription.para:
Reads the configuration file and sets the values. If controller can't read the configuration file or hasn't a correct formart, controller sets a default values on member vaiables.
parent

briefdescription.para: Destroys the controller.
Imports projet from json file.

detaileddescription.para:
Decodes JSON format of the file received by parameter and try to convert it in a ContextualizationModel object. Returns a #Error code.
path
File path where be readed data project.
int

briefdescription.para: Exports project to json file.

detaileddescription.para:
Codes the actual model to JSON format and sabe data in the file received by parameter. Returns true if project was exported succesfully, otherwise, returns false.
path
File path where be saved data project.
bool

briefdescription.para: Checks the actual state of the model.

detaileddescription.para:
Returns the error code of the actual state of the model.
ModelError

briefdescription.para: Generates a packet with the contextualization data.

detaileddescription.para:
After verifying that the model contains no errors, it packages all the information in a zip file with the data to be sent. If there aren't errors, returns the path of the zip file, else returns an empty QString.
QString

briefdescription.para: Process that is responsible for sending the file received by parameter.

detaileddescription.para:
Using credentials received por parameters, sends by SFTP protocol the file. Return the code error returned by SFTP process or a CodeError If there were any errors during the process.
path
File path to send.
user
Username credential.
password
Password credential.

briefdescription.para: Extracts the strings contained in the image set in the model.

detaileddescription.para:
Returns a QList of FirmwareString containing all of strings extracted converted in FirmwareString objects if are in the fp file. Each firmware string on QList is a FirmwareString Object extracted from the image.
image
Path of image where strings will be detected.
List of FirmwareString found on image.

briefdescription.para: Extracts the strings contained in the image set in the model.

detaileddescription.para:
Returns a QList of FirmwareString containing all of strings extracted converted in FirmwareString objects if are in the fp file. Each firmware string on QList is a FirmwareString Object extracted from the image. This is that #sendContextualization(QString image), this is more fast but less precise.
image
Path of image where strings will be detected.
List of FirmwareString found on image.

briefdescription.para: Processes received strings.

detaileddescription.para:
Tries to find the strings value in fp file and strings that are in the file are returned converted in FirmwareString object. Returns QList of FirmwareString containing strings found in fp file..
strings
String value to be processed.
List of FirmwareStirng found in fp file.

briefdescription.para: Find the text received by parameter in fp file.

detaileddescription.para:
There are diferrent find types. The second parameter indicates the member class of FirmwareString that the text received by parameter have to be compared. Returns a firmware string list containing all strings that be found.
text
Text to be found.
matchType
Type of find to be done.

inbodydescription.para: If only have to find strings with DONE state, tries to do search in DONE_FP_FIlE, else use englishFpFile_.
Tries to use DONE_FP_FILE if is possible to do searches faster.

briefdescription.para: Checks the parameter state is a valid state.

detaileddescription.para:
Valid states are stored in a private QStringList validstates. Return true if the state is a valid state and return false if not.
state
QString state to check.
bool

briefdescription.para: Adds a new string on the model.

detaileddescription.para:
The FirmwareString is added on the model of the tool if is not wrong or is already in the model. If the parameter fwString is null, nothing is done. Return true if FirmwareString is added successfully and false if not.
fwString
The string to add on the model.
Error code.

briefdescription.para: Adds new strings on the model.

detaileddescription.para:
Append all strings in the list that are not wrong or are already in the model. Returns the number of strings that have been added to the model.
strings
Strings list to be added in the model.

briefdescription.para: Removes the string in the model with the id received by parameter.

detaileddescription.para:
Returns true if the string was removed succesfully or false if the string is not in the model.
row
Row number of the string to be removed.
bool

briefdescription.para: Removes the string in the model row number received by parameter.

detaileddescription.para:
Returns true if the string was removed succesfully or false if the string is not in the model.
row
Row number of the string to be removed.
bool

briefdescription.para: Remove all strings in the model.
Select the string with the identifier received by parameter.

detaileddescription.para:
Returns true if string was selected succesfully, otherwise, returns false.
id
Identifier of strogn to select.
state
Selection state
bool

briefdescription.para: Sets a no image in the model.
Starts a process that allow user capture an area of the screen.

detaileddescription.para:
The user have to select the area to capture with the mouse. Return the path where the capture is stored or an empty QString if an error ocurred.
QString

briefdescription.para: setImage

parameterdescription.para: Path of image that will be set to the model. Returns true if the image is setted succesfully or returns false if the image can not setted.

briefdescription.para: Checks that the FirmwareString is not already in the model.

detaileddescription.para:
If the FirmwareString has no empty id, checks that there is not any FirmwareString with the same id. If the FirmwareString id is empty, then checks that there is not any FirmwareString with the same value.
fwString
bool

briefdescription.para: Erases, from the string list received by parameter, strings that already are in the model.

detaileddescription.para:
Return the number of strings erased from the strings list.
strings
List of strings to be processed.
int

briefdescription.para: Returns the actual image of the model.
Returns the model to be used by ListView, TableView or similar QML object.
Returns a current date time with the format received by parameter.

parameterdescription.para: Format to returns the date time.

briefdescription.para: Reads the configuration file, if it exists, and sets the class members to the values in the file.
Saves config in configuration file to can be recuperated in the next run of contetualization tool.
Creates a copy of englishFp file in /tmp with only firmware strings with DONE status.

detaileddescription.para:
If copy was created succesfully returns 0, otherwise returns the code error.
Code error

briefdescription.para: Filters a list of firmware strings. Remove from the list all strings that have not the same state as the one received by parameter.

detaileddescription.para:
Returns number of strings removed.
list
Firmware strings list to be filtered.
state
State that will be filtered.
Number of removed strings.

memberdef.argsstring: (const QString &image, int chunkWidth, int chunkHeight, bool *someError=Q_NULLPTR)
memberdef.name: splitImage

briefdescription.para: Splits an image in one or more chunks depending of chunk size received by argument.

detaileddescription.para: If the width of the image is not divisible by the chunkWidth respectively, the last chunk of the row will narrower than all the others. Works the same way for height of image and chunkHeight. Chunks are saved on disk.
Returns a list with path of image chunks. Only returns chunks that have been saved on disk succesfully.

If ok is nonnull pointer, ok will be set to true if all chunks are saved on disk succesfully.
image
Image to split.
chunkWidth
Width of each part of image.
chunkHeight
Height of each part of image.
QStringList with chunks of image.

briefdescription.para: Returns a value of a parameter in config file.
Sets a parameter in configuration file.

detaileddescription.para:
Returns true if parameter is saved succesfully, otherwhise returns false.
parameter
Parameter name
value
Parameter value
bool

briefdescription.para: Reads all fp language files that there was congigurated in database.

detaileddescription.para:
Process all strings and storage in database strings with state VALIDADED.
bool

briefdescription.para: Tries to add a new string into the model.

detaileddescription.para:
This slot interacts with the user through the screen showing messages.
newString
New strign to add.
matchType
Mode in which the string is to be searched for

briefdescription.para: Tries to remove the string in the model with the identifier receiven by parameter.
Removes all strings in the model.
Make a screen capture.

parameterdescription.para: Flag to know if is neccesary detect strings on capture.

briefdescription.para: Loads an image in the model.

parameterdescription.para: Flag to know if is neccesary detect strings on capture.

briefdescription.para: Detects strings in the current image of the model and tries to add them into.
Tries to send the active contextualization to a remote host.
Ensures that the user wants to cancel the project and closes the application in an orderly manner.
Saves current project.
Opens a dialog and saves current project in the path specied for the user.
Opens a project saves on disk.
Refreshes all components on current contextualization (DoneFpFile, Image, Strings...).
Creates a new empty project.
Process VALIDATED strings in fp files and storage it in database.
The signal is emitted when a new string is added to the model or a string is removed from the model.
The signal is emitted when a image is setted on the model.
This is the controller base class.
